name: Patch Keepers
description:
Patch Keepers is a Tower Defense Game.

Protect your base from evil monsters with the help of Keepers

Every enemy has their own stats tied to the evolve point that they drop

Evolve Points are dropped by the monster and are used to upgrade and evolve your Keeper

How to Play

Camera Controls:

I and O for Zoom(I)n / Zoom(O)ut

The Game has it's own "Tutorial" that can be played but incase it isn't clear enough:

Clicking on your Keeper brings up a Stats and options for that Keeper

You can apply the evolve points you get from monsters to the keeper in that Options

Max Evolve points that can be applied: 5

Max  Evolve points for each point: 10

Credits

All Art is self made

Sounds: SFXR

Additional Information

There is controller support (Buttons has to be clicked otherwise)

Made For the GO Godot 3 Game Jam
